meanings.definition: The quality or state of being acceptable.
meanings.sent1: Her strict standards ensured the acceptablenesses of all the submissions.
meanings.sent2: The teacher evaluated the students' work based on its acceptablenesses.
meanings.sent3: The party planner's obsession with the acceptablenesses of the decorations was comical.
meanings.sent4: The artist's painting captured the acceptablenesses of nature in a beautiful way.
meanings.sent5: The team's success was dependent on the acceptablenesses of their strategy.

meanings.definition: The degree to which something is deemed suitable or satisfactory.
meanings.sent1: The acceptablenesses of the proposal were discussed during the meeting.
meanings.sent2: Customers' feedback is crucial in determining the acceptablenesses of a product.
meanings.sent3: The chef's insistence on the acceptablenesses of the ingredients led to a hilarious mix-up.
meanings.sent4: The politician's speech highlighted the acceptablenesses of his policies.
meanings.sent5: The team's performance exceeded the acceptablenesses expected by their coach.
